text: The 2018 Sun Belt Women's Basketball Tournament was the postseason women's basketball tournament for the Sun Belt Conference began on March 6 and ending on March 11, 2018, at the Lakefront Arena in New Orleans.https://sunbeltsports_ftp.sidearmsports.com/custompages/champs/201718/BKB/2018WBB_champbracket.pdf ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="white-space:nowrap; font-size:90%;" |- | colspan="10" style="text-align:center; background:#DDDDDD; font:#000000" | 2018 Sun Belt Women's Basketball Tournament seeds and results |- bgcolor="#efefef" !
